title: PhotoCamera.GetPreviewBufferArgb32 is broken on WP8 emulator
body: This function used to return the correct debug screen on Windows Phone 7 emulator, but it returns a buffer full of 0xffffffff values when executing it under Windows Phone 8 emulator.

comments.body: remove 32 from the end and use PhotoCamera.GetPreviewBufferArgb. It works best in wp8
